attributes.action: Add a voting option of "No confidence in any of the above" on every ballot paper
attributes.additional_details:
Given the increasing number of "spoiled" ballot papers, there is evidently a requirement for a mandatory voting option of "No confidence in any of the parties or candidates on this ballot paper" More often than not we have a choice of the lesser evil, or can't be bothered at all as there is no point, given the poor choices. 

It's about time the electorate had an official voice and option of putting down their X to say "We don't want any of these" to send a clear message to Westminster.
attributes.background: In the last three years of political chaos it seems there are more people who are politically homeless due to the farcical and inept way in which Brexit has been handled. We've seen MPs going back on their word, refusals to answer direct questions and self serving
